name: Coding Quiz-
description: This application is a timer-based quiz application that stores high scores client-side

name: Day Planner-
description: This is a calendar application that allows the user to save events for each hour of the day.

name: Weather Dashboard-
description: This application has the search functionality to find current weather conditions and forecast the weather outlook for 5-days for multiple cities.

name: Note Taker-
description: This application is used to write,save and delete user notes. This app uses an express backend to save and retrieve note data from a JSON file.

name: Crime Radar-
description: This application allows users to input the name of any place or city in the United States, along with a search radius in miles, and will return up to 50 real-time crime reports within the search radius provided around the provided city or place.

name: Rendezvous-
description: This application allows users to someone can find like minded people with common interests
